name: Liminal Corridors
description:
THIS GAME CONTAINS LOUD SOUNDS AND SCARY MOMENTS. PLAYER DISCRETION IS ADVISED.

Walk the endless, nonsensical space of the liminal corridors. Get lost in the meaninglessness of it all, but watch out for what lurks in the shadows.

Liminal Corridors is an attempt at creating a procedural world survival horror experience. THIS GAME IS  A PROTOTYPE. There are bugs to work out, particularly with some of the lag spikes, but this product is still playable. How long can you last?

Credits

Development Lead: Robbie Wagner(PompousRhombus)

Game Developed using Unity Engine

3D Models made using Blender

While this is meant to be a prototype, feedback is much appreciated! If you would like to give feedback on any of my games, please use this link. To report bugs, use this link instead.
